front-end-description: I specialize web pages developing using React using TypeScript and its variants such as React Native for mobile applications and Next Js to optimize SEO, this application was made with Next JS. Lately I haven't used Angular anymore, but I have knowledge to develop websites with said technology. I can develop landing pages using "HUGO" framework or just html, css and javascript. To style components I prefer Material UI combined with Tailwind CSS I have also used Bootstrap. To unit test e2e I've used Cypress.
